[松]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sɢloŋ ): semantic 木 ( “ wood ” ) + phonetic 公 ( OC *kloːŋ ) .

[鬆]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sqʰloːŋs, *sqʰluːŋ, *skʰloŋ, *sqʰloŋ ): semantic 髟 ( “ hair ” ) + phonetic 松 ( OC *sɢloŋ ) .

[㞞]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 ): semantic 尸 ( “ body ” ) + phonetic 從 .
